title: Adi shankararin mEdai
sahitya:
Adi shankararin mEdai sheyalgaLellAm arputam arputamE bhagavAn


anupallavi

  vEda vEdAnta jyOti vivEka cUDAmaNI gItai upaniSad brahma sUtrA nidhi


caraNam    advaita orumaiyAl akhilAtma kOTiyin aikyattai nATTinAn Adityan pOlavE arivoLi vIsiyE
AghaviruLai mATrinAn tatvamasi mantra cittan jIvan muktan saccidAnanda shiva dakSiNAmUrtiyE
